entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
